Interface TableElement

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicTable, MaterializedView, ReadOnlyTable, Table

    public interface TableElement
    Interface that defines meta entity as a table in the DB.
    Since:
    2017-06-13
    Author:
    ioann
